title: The Body Shop Vitamin E Face Mist, 3.3-Fluid Ounce
description: Vitamin E Face Mist is a quick skin pick-me up and excellent for setting make-up. Spritz it on for instant refreshment, moisture, and protection. With a delicate rosewater scent. Spray the moisturizing mist onto your face once or twice and allow it to dry. It is excellent for setting make–up; just spray over make–up to seal it after applying. Carry with you when traveling, especially when flying to protect your skin from dry air in the cabin and climate changes, so you’ll have healthy–looking, hydrated skin when you arrive. Try keeping face mist in the refrigerator during the summer for extra coolness.

title: The Body Shop Cactus Body Brush
description: Take your lather farther by pairing this handy brusher with your favorite shower gel or soap. Leaves skin massaged, smooth, and soft....

title: St. Ives Facial Moisturizer, Timeless Skin Collagen Elastin, 10oz
Fantasea Natural Bristle Body Brush, 3.5 Ounce
description: Fantasea natural bristle body brush used to exfoliate skin, increase blood flow and promote healthy glowing skin. Features a handle for a secure grip.

title: Blemish Control Green Tea Scrub by St. Ives, 4.5 Ounce
Scunci Effortless Beauty Basic Jaw Clips,9 Cm, 3-Count
description: With scunci effortless beauty hair accessories a woman should never have a bad hair day. scunci jaw clips can be used in a variety of ways. easily put in a semi-formal updo or make a tousled ponytail. can be used to section hair for cutting, curling or drying. interlocking jaws hold hair in place. basic black, clear for unobtrusive hold and tortoise brown for neutral hold.
